name: Alarak
title: Highlord of the Tal'darim
description: A combo Assasin that can move enemies around and punish mistakes.

primary.name: Discord Strike
primary.description: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 175 damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.

primary.name: Telekinesis
primary.description: Create a force, pushing Alarak and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals 48 damage to enemies.

primary.name: Lighting Surge
primary.description: Deal 62 damage to an enemy and an additional 100% damage to enemies between Alarak and the target. Restore 70 health for each Hero hit.

primary.name: Counter-Strike
primary.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 damage.

primary.name: Deadly Charge
primary.description:
After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.6 seconds.

Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

primary.name: Sadism
primary.description: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes. Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

1.name: Sustaining Power
1.description: Increases the healing Alarak receives from dealing damage to Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.

1.name: Extended Lightning
1.questDescription: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge.
1.rewardDescription:
After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%.
After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.
After hitting 3 Heroes with a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

1.name: Ruthless Momentum
1.description: Basic Abilities recharge 20% faster while above 80% Health.

4.name: Chaos Reigns
4.rewardDescription:
After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 60.
After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 60.
After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 60 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

4.name: Negatively Charged
4.description: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%.
4.questDescription: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 3%.

4.name: Show of Force
4.description: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 70 damage.

7.name: Dissonance
7.description: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Hindered Motion
7.description: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Applied Force
7.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.

10.name: Deadly Charge
10.description:
After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.6 seconds.

Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

10.name: Counter-Strike
10.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 damage.

13.name: Blade of the Highlord
13.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 6% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 30%. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

13.name: Pure Malice
13.description: Increase Sadism by 6% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

13.name: Rite of Rak'Shir
13.description: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds. Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 6% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds. Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

16.name: Lethal Onslaught
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

16.name: Lightning Barrage
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

16.name: Mocking Strikes
16.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Counter-Strike
20.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 damage. This ability will take over your Trait button.

20.name: Deadly Charge
20.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.6 seconds. Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling. This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.

20.name: Last Laugh
20.description: Activate teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes 3 times with Basic Abilities within 4 seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to 1.

20.name: Hasty Bargain
20.description: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism bonus by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.
